_xResult.title: Through the Forest Kaftan
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made grey kaftan/caftan with delectable texture
_xResult.longdesc:
This kimono kaftan/caftan cardigan is high quality handmade linen clothing. As a master of her craft, Aiste will be sure to make this long jacket to perfectly fit your body so that it doesn't come off too baggy or too fitted. Let your preferences be king for this made to measure sculpture—custom choose your measurments, detail preferences and color. If you want it shorter, she can do that too! Plus size long linen jackets are available.

 

Aiste says, "The wholesomeness of the landscape and the vast expanse of nature that surround me is my inspiration. The geometric patterns of the tree trunks in the forest, the rise and fall of the waves in the sea, the colors of the passing seasons: all these elements come together when I produce my hand-sewn fabrics."

 

If you've never experienced having a coat or jacket made custom to your measurements, you'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly

properties.propvalue: Washable cold, hang dry. Dry clean ok.
